ygData.subject: Re: Why on 40 on the Forage
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, as a Wood Elf I do fine with my forgaing, but could understand the frustration from others. What I still don t understand is why bother giving us hide or
ygData.messageBody:
Well, as a Wood Elf I do fine with my forgaing, but could understand the
frustration from others.

What I still don't understand is why bother giving us hide or sneak when the
cap is so low one will not risk using the skill? Even with my HIGHER cap as
a Wood Elf, any time I would find hiding useful I just would never use it.
Why? Hide and I'd more likely be killed than saved. Very very likely
killed. One can depend on hiding failure at our cap, with no way to tell
success. So hide stays hidden in the skills menu, never hotkeyed. O, and
thanks for the sneak, just in time for the song which replaces it!

Now I'm certain Safe Fall a bard would find more useful than a monk. Almost
broke my neck travelling through Oasis with my Accelerado beat going.
Suppose that's capped to the point it never works either though, don't have
it yet.

Roop
-----Original Message-----
From: Lynn Uhlman <uhlmar@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, May 25, 1999 8:43 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Why on 40 on the Forage


Hello, my fellow soloists
I have a bone to pick with Verant. Why give us the ability to forage if
the skill cap is 40. The whole point for foraging is that it can take the
place of buying food. So you can rely on it to meet all you dietary needs.
I am a lvl 14 bard and my forage is maxed. I use it constantly and very
rarely do i ever get any rewards for my persistence. I say we all ban
together and e-mail Verant demanding they increase the skill lvl. I mean
why not, it's not like we can use the skill to make any money at it... LETS
BAND TOGETHER FELLOW BARDS AND DEMAND VERANT TO ADD THIS TO THE NEXT
PATCH.....

Sing loud and proud fellow bards...
